api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.keywords: DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.TokenType DSharpPlus DiscordConfiguration TokenType TokenType Sets the type of the token used to identify the client Defaults to Bot Declaration public TokenType TokenType set Property Value Type Description TokenType
api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.ct_sum:
Sets the type of the token used to identify the client.
Defaults to Bot.

api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.title: Property UdpClientFactory in Class DiscordConfiguration
api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.keywords: DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.UdpClientFactory DSharpPlus DiscordConfiguration UdpClientFactory UdpClientFactory Sets the factory method used to create instances of UDP clients Use and equivalents on other implementations to switch out client implementations Defaults to Declaration public UdpClientFactoryDelegate UdpClientFactory set Property Value Type Description UdpClientFactoryDelegate
api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.ct_sum:
Sets the factory method used to create instances of UDP clients.
Use  and equivalents on other implementations to switch out client implementations.
Defaults to .

api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.title: Property UseRelativeRatelimit in Class DiscordConfiguration
api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.keywords: DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.UseRelativeRatelimit DSharpPlus DiscordConfiguration UseRelativeRatelimit UseRelativeRatelimit Sets whether to rely on Discord for NTP Network Time Protocol synchronization with the X Ratelimit Reset After header If the system clock is unsynced setting this to true will ensure ratelimits are synced with Discord and reduce the risk of hitting one This should only be set to false if the system clock is synced with NTP Defaults to true Declaration public bool UseRelativeRatelimit set Property Value Type Description Boolean
api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.ct_sum:
Sets whether to rely on Discord for NTP (Network Time Protocol) synchronization with the "X-Ratelimit-Reset-After" header.
If the system clock is unsynced, setting this to true will ensure ratelimits are synced with Discord and reduce the risk of hitting one.
This should only be set to false if the system clock is synced with NTP.
Defaults to true.

api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.title: Property WebSocketClientFactory in Class DiscordConfiguration
api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.keywords: DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.WebSocketClientFactory DSharpPlus DiscordConfiguration WebSocketClientFactory WebSocketClientFactory Sets the factory method used to create instances of WebSocket clients Use and equivalents on other implementations to switch out client implementations Defaults to Declaration public WebSocketClientFactoryDelegate WebSocketClientFactory set Property Value Type Description WebSocketClientFactoryDelegate
api/DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.html.ct_sum:
Sets the factory method used to create instances of WebSocket clients.
Use  and equivalents on other implementations to switch out client implementations.
Defaults to .

Refreshes your commands, used for refreshing choice providers or applying commands registered after the ready event on the discord client.
Should only be run on the slash command extension linked to shard 0 if sharding.
Not recommended and should be avoided since it can make slash commands be unresponsive for a while.

api/DSharpPlus.Entities.DiscordEmoji.htm.keywords: DSharpPlus.Entities.DiscordEmoji.FromName(DSharpPlus.BaseDiscordClient,System.String,System.Boolean) DSharpPlus Entities DiscordEmoji FromName DSharpPlus BaseDiscordClient System String System Boolean FromName(BaseDiscordClient, String, Boolean) Creates an emoji obejct from emote name that includes colons eg thinking This method also supports skin tone variations eg skin tone 2 standard emoticons eg D as well as guild emoji still specified by name Declaration public static DiscordEmoji FromName BaseDiscordClient client string name bool includeGuilds true Parameters Type Name Description BaseDiscordClient client BaseDiscordClient to attach to the object String name Name of the emote to find including colons eg thinking Boolean includeGuilds Should guild emojis be included in the search Returns Type Description DiscordEmoji Create DiscordEmoji object
api/DSharpPlus.Entities.DiscordEmoji.htm.ct_sum:
Creates an emoji obejct from emote name that includes colons (eg. :thinking:). This method also supports 
skin tone variations (eg. 👌:skin-tone-2:), standard emoticons (eg. :D), as well as guild emoji 
(still specified by :name:).

    If automatically sharding, this will use the GetShardId(UInt64, Int32) method.
    Otherwise if manually sharding, it will instead iterate through each shard's guild caches.

api/DSharpPlus.DiscordClient.html#DSharp.ct_sum:
Gets a dictionary of guilds that this client is in. The dictionary's key is the guild ID. Note that the
guild objects in this dictionary will not be filled in if the specific guilds aren't available (the
GuildAvailable or GuildDownloadCompleted events haven't been fired yet)

Sets whether to enable default help command.
Disabling this will allow you to make your own help command.

Modifying default help can be achieved via custom help formatters (see  and SetHelpFormatter<T>() for more details). 
It is recommended to use help formatter instead of disabling help.

Defaults to true.

api/DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkUtilitie.ct_sum:
Indicates whether a new track should be started after reciving this TrackEndReason. If this is false, either this event is
already triggered because another track started (REPLACED) or because the player is stopped (STOPPED, CLEANUP).

If no arguments aside from presences and nonce are specified, this will request all guild members.
